page.title: 16Health care in Chatteris
page.content: The present doctors' surgery in Chatteris has three young doctors, two male and one female, plus numerous other ancilliary staff. A computerised system of patients' records is kept with facility to recall those requiring various vaccinations and injections eg rubella, tuberculosis and tetanus (this area is high risk). The surgery itself is a new building purposely designed in order to house various clinics, such as a Baby Clinic, Diet Clinic, chiropodist surgery, there is a nurse always in attendance. The number of patients catered for is about six thousand and some of these are visited by health visitors and social workers who also have their own office at the surgery. The registrar of births and deaths is also in attendance three days weekly.
